The company has integrations for electronic data interchange (EDI) which can support transaction sets like X12.
MRG Exams emphasizes the use of secure cloud infrastructure to support their services, likely involving AWS or similar.
Candidate data and exam results handling is done in compliance with various health-tech standards.
